external_games.name: Wargame: AirLand Battle - Vox Populi (Free DLC)

name: Wargame: AirLand Battle - Vox Populi
summary: Vox Populi, the first free DLC from Wargame AirLand Battle, has been developed specifically to respond to the demands of the community… and has just landed with a whole arsenal of new features! "Conquest" mode makes a great comeback in Multiplayer mode and against the AI, offering a range of new objectives to commanders all over the world.
